org.drip.analytics.curve
Class ZeroCurve

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.analytics.curve.DiscountCurve
          org.drip.analytics.curve.ZeroCurve
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bootstrapable, LiveQuote
public class ZeroCurve
extends DiscountCurve

This class contains the baseline zero discount curve holder object. It maintains term structure for the spot zeroes, the current discount factors, the accrual fractions, and the corresponding dates.
